fn_tests.input_infer: serialize_newtype_struct::<T>(self, _name: "valid_name", value: &T) where T is a type that correctly implements Serialize; serialize_newtype_struct::<T>(self, _name: "empty_name", value: &None) where T is Unit type; serialize_newtype_struct::<T>(self, _name: "very_large_struct", value: &large_serializable_struct) where T is a struct with a large number of fields; serialize_newtype_struct::<T>(self, _name: "non_serializable", value: &non_serializable_instance) where T does not implement Serialize;
